title: William J. Turkel, “Spark from the Deep” (Johns Hopkins UP, 2013)
description:
“In a sense, all life consists of the colonization of an electric world. But to see that, we have to go back to the very beginning.” William J. Turkel‘s new book traces the emergence and inhabiting of an electric world through the span of human history and beyond. Embracing a...
